attributes.action: freedom from oppression social justice and change
attributes.additional_details: Log my petition please im holding great council to this state I created sure start eradicated mrsa in Trafford hospital Tony Blair Bev Hughes Laurence Walsh all used wrong power of control and Authority over me let a innocent with mother suffer unjustly had great injustices been hell and back stuck in complaints systems for years all reformed my work im a visionary right activist social reformer philosophy brought into action from rainbow picture Lord asked me spoke to me said if you need to put love in education go educate hearts and minds got case effects all laws in the land and holding great council even Govement feeding from my work yet im being ignored educated Church of England in policy care Ofsted feed from wrk Nspcv  letters of support saying im noble like ti bless other natons talk world leaders
